content.text: O-Saki is a resident of Ebisu Town.
Nothing is known about Saki's appearance.
Nothing is known about Saki's personality, but she is friendly with Tonoyasu.
At some point in time, Saki had her emotional expressions stripped away by eating a defective SMILE fruit, and could only smile.
When Tonoyasu was checking in with everyone in Ebisu Town, he asked Saki how her son was, prompting Saki's son to call out to Tonoyasu.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 93 Chapter 940 (p. 8), Saki is first mentioned.
